properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 1 at 2:49PM PST until February 4 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 25 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 12 to 17 feet expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 kt with some isolated gusts up
to 40 kt early on Sunday and seas 10 to 13 feet.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM Sunday to 3 AM PST
Tuesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM PST Sunday.
There will be an initial peak in winds early Sunday, then a
lull in activity from late morning through the early afternoon
hours on Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO 3 AM PST TUESDAY
